meanings.sent1: The snake was sibilating loudly in the grass.
meanings.sent2: I heard the kettle sibilating on the stove.
meanings.sent3: The cat sibilating at the birds outside was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The wind sibilating through the trees sounded like a whispering secret.
meanings.sent5: The sibilating sound of the leaking pipe was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The teapot was sibilating as it reached boiling point.
meanings.sent2: The radiator started sibilating in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent3: The angry goose sibilating at the other animals was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The steam sibilating from the pressure cooker signaled dinner was ready.
meanings.sent5: The tires sibilating on the wet road made driving difficult.

meanings.sent1: The wind was sibilating through the cracks in the window.
meanings.sent2: The audience could hear the kettle sibilating backstage.
meanings.sent3: The old teapot sibilating on the stove was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The steam sibilating from the train's engine signaled its departure.
meanings.sent5: The sibilating sound of the wind in the night was eerie.
